TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sacrifice the boar to grant mounted units in the stack a boar mount for less movement and archer effectiveness but increased effectiveness against melee. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Replaces existing mount types.
